title: Crimson Desert Is For Fighting Game Sickos Like Me
description: We did not expect Crimson Desert's combat to be this in-depth, and now this game is on our radar.
excerpt: We did not expect Crimson Desert's combat to be this in-depth, and now this game is on our radar.
